36 Dec 39,181 3,888 43,069 8,359 Total 389,099 57,066 446,165 93,272 1945 Jan 39,382 2,731 42,113 5,094 Feb 47,554 7,446 55,000 13,554 Mar 64,323 11,000 75,323 24,956 Apr 41,591 5,362 46,953 14,528 68 5,712 9,883 10,716 7,721 5,712 6,567 7 6,574 55,923 7,139 63,062 24 7,745 62,356 5,410 67,766 4,300 1 4,301 44,864 7,311 52,175 3,101 4,574 98 4,672 41,035 11,825 52,860 5,436 4,019 140 4,159 50,665 748 51,413 46 8,405 351 8,726 93,623 51,594 301 577 9,027 56,266 52,171 533,965 4,235 60,501 57,994 591,959 14 5,108 6,941 312 7,253 51,417 3,057 54,474 334 13,888 10,955 505 11,460 72,063 8,285 80,348 2,452 2,452 27,408 13,337 1,935 15,272 102,616 15,387 118,003 1,152 15,680 5,689 920 May 301 301 Total 192,850 26,539 219,389 58,433 3,952 67 368 62,385 36,989 3,672 40,661 288,272 34,163 322,435 6,609 61,808 67 368 7,434 69,242 - Grand Total 624,141 90,578 714,719 159,858 4,329 164,187 88,607 4,249 92,856 872,606 99,156 971,762 *High Explosive.   ## p. 652 (#676) ############################################    ## p. 653 (#677) ############################################  Appendix 21 Tons of Bombs Dropped in the Mediterranean Theater of Operations June 1942 to May 1945 Heavy Bomber Med/Lt Bomber Fighter All Types HE* Incendiary Total HE* Incendiary Total HE* Incendiary Total HE* Incendiary Total 1942 Jun 115 115 115 115 Jul 357 357 357 357 Aug 346 346 68 68 414 414 Sep 411 411 71 71 482 482 Oct 424 424 297 297 50 50 771 771 Nov 815 815 329 329 51 51 1,195 1,195 Dec 783 783 212 212 81 81 1,076 1,076 Total 3,251 3,251 977 977 182 182 4,410 4,410 1943 Jan 1,354 1,354 586 2 588 41 41 1,981 2 2 1,983 Feb 1,221 1,221 488 488 10 10 1,719 1,719 Mar 1,557 1,557 1,162 1,162 54 54 2,773 2,773 Apr 2,777 2,777 1,935 1,935 341 341 5,053 5,053 May 4,305 4,305 2,334 1 2,335 656 1 657 7,295 2 7,297 Jun 4,732 4,732 3,030 3,030 834 Jul 6,883 6,883 5,680 5,680 1,283 834 1,283 13,846 8,596 8,596 13,846 Aug 5,047 5,047 5,948 5,948 1,589 1,589 12,584 12,584 Sep 5,256 27 5,283 7,171 7,171 1,488 1,4
